@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package com.projetloki.genesis

A library for generating CSS from Java (Tutorial).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CssBuilder
    Object passed to a CSS module, that receives rules and other declarations.
    CssModule
    A CSS module is responsible for generating a part of the CSS code.
    PropertiesOrBuilder
    Interface implemented by both Properties and Properties.Builder.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    CSS3 animations make it possible to animate transitions from one CSS style configuration to another.
    AttributePredicate
    Matches elements on the basis of either the presence of an attribute, or the match of an attribute value.
    BackgroundLayer
    A background image to paint on the background area.
    FontFace
    The font-face rule allows authors to specify online fonts to display text on their web pages.
    Genesis
    A library for generating CSS from Java (Tutorial).
    Genesis.Builder
    A builder for creating Genesis instances.
    Keyframes
    Defines initial, final and intermediate steps in a CSS animation sequence.
    Keyframes.Builder
    A builder for creating keyframes.
    MediaCondition
    A single media query, or several media queries combined with the or operator.
    MediaFeature
    An expression that check for the conditions of particular media features.
    MediaQuery
    A media type, and possibly one or more expressions (media features), which resolve to either true or false.
    Properties
    An immutable set of CSS properties.
    Properties.Builder
    A builder for creating sets of CSS properties.
    PseudoClass
    A pseudo-class specifies a special state of the element to be selected.
    Selector
    A CSS selector, to match a set of elements in an HTML or XML documents.
    Shadow
    A shadow to add to a text or a box.
    TimingFunction
    A mathematical function that describes how fast one-dimensional values change during transitions or animations.
    TransformFunction
    A geometric transformation to apply to an element.
    Transition
    Transitions, which are part of the CSS3 set of specifications, provide a way to control animation speed when changing CSS properties.
